Okezue Bell (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka na-emepụta ihe, ọkà mmụta sayensị na injinia, na sayensị, teknụzụ, injinia na mgbakọ na mwepụ (STEM) na-akwalite, yana onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya. Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2022 International BioGENEius Grand Prize na NASDAQ Face of Entrepreneurship.
Okezue bi na Easton, Pennsylvania ebe ọ na-aga Moravian Academy Upper School.

Okezue na-eme nnyocha ugbu a na Boston Children's Hospital's Engle Lab, dị ka Research Science Institute (RSI) Scholar. Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nyocha na MIT Media Lab na Massachusetts General Hospital / Harvard Medical School.
Bell bụ akụkụ nke Perfect Day's Sustainability & Health Advisory Council (SHAC) n'akụkụ Leonardo DiCaprio, David R
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Gen Z Council ha. Ihe Bell lekwasịrị anya na gburugburu ebe obibi bụ na ụlọ ọrụ nri; ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ maka Aleph Farms, na ụdị ndị ọzọ, gụnyere evolvetogether na H&M
Bell bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke Modern Meat, akwụkwọ nkuzi gbasara ọrụ ugbo cellular nke Cellular Agriculture Society bipụtara.

Okezue bụ onye na-ede akụkọ maka Sundiata Post, magazin Naijiria, ma na-ede maka blọọgụ nke onwe ya. Ọrụ odeakụkọ ya apụtawokwa na CellAgri na UN Voices of Youth Ọ na-eduzi ọmụmụ ihe ụmụ akwụkwọ na ntụziaka na ntinye aka STEM site n'aka ndị ntorobịa, ọkachasị ndị na-anọchite anya obere ma ọ bụ ndị ka nta. Ọmụmụ ihe ya na mbọ mgbasa ozi ya na-akwado United Nations na World Economic Forum na òtù ndị mmekọ ya, ma eruo ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ 65,000.
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Septemba afọ 2022, a nwalere ihe Bell mepụtara dị ọnụ ala, nke a na-akpọ WeArm, na mmadụ iri na abụọ nwere nkwarụ

Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na Johnson & Johnson na Microsoft na ịmepụta prototypes ndị ọzọ na ịnwale ngwaahịa ahụ na ụlọ ọgwụ ndị dị na mpaghara Sahara Africa. Ngwaọrụ ahụ enwetala ihe karịrị $ 80,000 na ego na nkwado.

N'afọ 2020, Bell mepụtara Fidutam, ngwa nke na-eji teknụzụ blockchain iji nye ndị na-enweghị ego ID akaụntụ ụlọ akụ. Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022, a nwalere Fidutam n'obodo atọ: Bronx, New York, Chicago, Illinois, na Allentown, Pennsylvania
Bell na ndị otu ya enwetala ihe karịrị $ 150,000 iji malite onye na-anya ụgbọelu na Naịjirịa.
Okezue bụ onye otu ọgbọ nke ise nke Masayoshi Son's Masason Foundation.

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2022, Okezue bipụtara mpịakọta akpọrọ Applications of Gaussian Mutation for Self Adaptation in Evolutionary Genetic Algorithms, nke tụlere uru nke onye ọrụ mutation Gaussian na algọridim mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa.

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, e bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ nke Bell, nke akpọrọ On the Diffusion Time Evolution of Folding Chains in the Heteropolymer Model, dị ka akwụkwọ mbụ na ArXiv's mathematics - dynamical systems category
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ tụrụ aro iwu ike evolushọn oge maka mgbasa na protein folding.
